revision.text:
<!--공항_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Airport
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 공항명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 한자명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영어명-a | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = IATA | ontologyProperty = iataLocationIdentifier }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = ICAO | ontologyProperty = icaoLocationIdentifier }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = FAA | ontologyProperty = faaLocationIdentifier }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = LID | ontologyProperty = locationIdentifier }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 공항종별 | ontologyProperty = type }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 소유기관 | ontologyProperty = owner }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 운영기관 | ontologyProperty = operator }}
    	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 소유-운영기관 | ontologyProperty = owner }}
    	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 소유-운영기관 | ontologyProperty = operator }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 도시 | ontologyProperty = city }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 위치 | ontologyProperty = location }}
	{{DateIntervalMapping | templateProperty = 건립시기 | startDateOntologyProperty = buildingStartDate | endDateOntologyProperty = buildingEndDate }}
	{{DateIntervalMapping | templateProperty = 사용시기 | startDateOntologyProperty = openingDate | endDateOntologyProperty = dateOfAbandonment }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 책임자 | ontologyProperty = commander }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r1-방향 | ontologyProperty = runwayDesignation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r1-길이 | ontologyProperty = runwayLength | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r1-표면 | ontologyProperty = runwaySurface }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r2-방향 | ontologyProperty = runwayDesignation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r2-길이 | ontologyProperty = runwayLength | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r2-표면 | ontologyProperty = runwaySurface }}
			  {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r3-방향 | ontologyProperty = runwayDesignation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r3-길이 | ontologyProperty = runwayLength | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r3-표면 | ontologyProperty = runwaySurface }}
			  {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r4-방향 | ontologyProperty = runwayDesignation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r4-길이 | ontologyProperty = runwayLength | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r4-표면 | ontologyProperty = runwaySurface }}
			  {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r5-방향 | ontologyProperty = runwayDesignation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r5-길이 | ontologyProperty = runwayLength | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r5-표면 | ontologyProperty = runwaySurface }}
			  {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r6-방향 | ontologyProperty = runwayDesignation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r6-길이 | ontologyProperty = runwayLength | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r6-표면 | ontologyProperty = runwaySurface }}
			  {{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r7-방향 | ontologyProperty = runwayDesignation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r7-길이 | ontologyProperty = runwayLength | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r7-표면 | ontologyProperty = runwaySurface }}
  	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r8-방향 | ontologyProperty = runwayDesignation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r8-길이 | ontologyProperty = runwayLength | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = r8-표면 | ontologyProperty = runwaySurface }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
end}}
    

<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 시간기준 = KST
| 운영시간 = 
| 점유기관    = 
| metric-elev  = yes
| 해발-f  = 246
| 해발-m  = 75
| 좌표  = 

| h1-번호 = H1
| h1-길이= 30
| h1-표면=아스팔트
... h12- 까지 작성 가능


| stat-연도    = 
| stat1-제목 = 
| stat1-수치   = 
stat4- 까지 작성 가능
-->
